skdetail:

Invocation Name: fighting wildfires facts
des: Present facts to prepare your home against wildfires. These are tips for homeowners to prepare their homes to reduce the risks of homes getting burned by wildfires. Prevention is the best rescue policy.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
